main event: A round, greenish-white object described as a ball of light was observed traveling in a straight line in Wilton, Connecticut on 23 February 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds., Two observers reported the sighting from different locations., The object was described as greenish-white and round., The report concluded the sighting to be a meteor., The investigation was conducted by a special agent of the Air Force.
